name: Honey, I'm Home!!!
description:
Your drunk ass has one job and one job only:

Get back home on time, or you will face your wife's eternal wrath!!!!

Instruction:

Obstacles hurt you,
Beers heal you, somewhat,
And too much of anything will be bad for you.

But, as they say,
No Pain, No Gain.

Now get your ass home you drunkard.
